The next public meeting of the Montclair Board of Education will be held virtually on Mon., April 20, 2020 at 6:30 pm. The meeting will go into closed session until approximately 7:30 pm when it will reopen to the public. See agenda.

Registration for the 2020-2021 school year. As the district continues to take precautions related to COVID-19 please see important update regarding Registration.
If you are concerned that your child may have a physical, mental, learning or behavioral disability, you may request free screening and evaluation at any time, whether or not your child is enrolled in the Montclair Public Schools.
